item.title: New module: math/py-slepc4py version 3.18.2_py39
item.description: SLEPc is a Scalable Library for Eigenvalue Problem Computations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/slepc version 3.18.2
item.description: SLEPc is a Scalable Library for Eigenvalue Problem Computations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-petsc4py version 3.18.5_py39
item.description: Python bindings for PETSc, the Portable, Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/petsc version 3.18.5
item.description: PETSc, the Portable, Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation, is a suite of data structures and routines for the scalable (parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial differential equations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/arpack version 3.9.0
item.description: Collection of Fortran77 subroutines designed to solve large scale eigenvalue problems.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/git version 2.39.1
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/cdo version 2.1.1
item.description: CDO is a collection of command line Operators to manipulate and analyse Climate and NWP model Data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.8.4
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.
item.author: mthartma@stanford.edu (Mike Hartman)

item.title: New module: math/dealii version 9.4.1
item.description: deal.II is a C++ program library targeted at the computational solution of partial differential equations using adaptive finite elements.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/mpifileutils version 0.11.1
item.description: mpiFileUtils is a suite of MPI-based tools to manage large datasets, which may vary from large directory trees to large files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/py-seaborn version 0.12.1_py39
item.description: Seaborn is a Python data visualization library based on matplotlib. It provides a high-level interface for drawing attractive and informative statistical graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/make version 4.4
item.description: GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
